sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-col>
        <v-card class="ma-3" v-for="item in artList" :key="item.id">
            <v-row>
                <v-col>
                    <v-img :src="item.img"></v-img>
                </v-col>
                <v-col>
                    <v-card-title><v-chip color="pink" label class="white--text">{{item.Category.name}}</v-chip></v-card-title>
                </v-col>
            </v-row>
        </v-card>
    </v-col>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    data(){
       return {
        artList:[],
        queryParam:{
            pagesize:5,
            pagenum:1,
        },
        total:0,
       } 
    },
    created(){
        this.getArtList()
    },
    methods:{
        // 获取文章列表
        async getArtList(){
            const {data:res} = await this.$http.get('article', {params:{
                pagesize: this.queryParam.pagesize,
                pagenum: this.queryParam.pagenum
            }})
            this.artList = res.data
            this.total = res.total
            console.log(res)
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="">
    
</style>
